summary: REQ-1 and REQ-3 appear implemented via a global PwaInstallProvider (beforeinstallprompt handling) plus "Install App" entry points on SplashPage and in authenticated NavBar/Profile. REQ-2 appears mostly implemented via an InstallInstructionsDialog with platform tabs and copy-to-clipboard + toast confirmation. One acceptance-criteria item for REQ-2 (explicit fallback link to view instructions even when the native prompt is available) is not evidenced in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the install prompt is available, the UI still offers a fallback link to view instructions.
missing_requirements.reason: The new provider exposes openInstructions(), but the shown UI entry points (SplashPage/NavBar/Profile) call requestInstall() directly; there is no evidenced separate action/link/button that opens the instructions UI when canPromptInstall is true.
